title: [Midrian's Dyes, Front Room]
description: Sunlight slants across the room and illuminates several bottles of dye that are on display in this room.  The light reflects off of the bottles, creating a colorful prismatic spray across the oak floorboards and walls.  Several shelves are neatly hung upon the walls near a sturdy whitewashed door, while a low table and bench rest beneath the bay window set into the southern wall.

Torchlight slants across the room and illuminates several bottles of dye that are on display in this room.  The light reflects off of the bottles, creating a colorful prismatic spray across the oak floorboards and walls.  Several shelves are neatly hung upon the walls near a sturdy whitewashed door, while a low table and bench rest beneath the bay window set into the southern wall.
